metadata.title: CVE-2021-46991 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  i40e: Fix use-after-free in i40e_client_subtask()  Currently the call to i40e_client_del_instance frees the object pf->cinst, however pf->cinst->lan_info is being accessed after the free. Fix this by adding the missing return.  Addresses-Coverity: ("Read from pointer after free")
